about_the_game:
“The dark fate that was the
demise of Elysium itself.
It was the same,
Just like that day,”

“Why do you still insist
on protecting the human race!
All they are capable of is pain!
They kill each other for power!
And when they find that power,
it destroys them!”

“But why do we want to save the world?
We can win but the world
will still remain imperfect,
People around us will still be hurt,
We will still have enemies,
Evil will still exist,
Defeating Zanzoroth will not save
the world from the idea of evil,
It won’t guarantee unity and peace,
Bad things will still
happen all around us.
So what I’m trying to say is that
saving the world won’t save the world.
So why are we fighting?”

Story

2 nations have been trapped in a world war for so long they forgot why they are fighting in the first place. The war ends when an unknown force appears. They are ready to destroy all things because they gave up.

Join Addam on his journey to navigate tensions between nations, rediscover the history of the world, and to save the human race from their judgement!

Gameplay

Back in the old days RPGs used to be simple. Now they have to have all these systems that can at points hinder the experience. This game was made to be simple, walk around the world and sometimes encounter monsters. You fight the monsters using a traditional turn based battle system. With the battle system you can use a large variety of abilities you gain throughout the game. While exploring the world, you can find Treasure and other secrets.

Why the 3rd?

This is the first entry into the series despite being called the 3rd game. I’m doing this for 2 reasons, this was going to be a one off thing but I got a little carried away with writing the lore and this is a unique way to tell a story.

As of the Steam release, I have spent 10 years working on this story and 2 years working on this game.

Customize your gameplay experience

  • Customize your difficulty setting!
  • Built-in screenshot button!
  • Super amazing autosave function!
  • Change the font!
  • Customize your textbox color!
  • Customize the sounds of the menus in humorous ways!
  • Play with your Controller or a Keyboard!

content_descriptors.notes: This story has themes of Violence, Racism, Trauma, Death, and the end of all things. You will also find a few instances of Suicide, mild offensive language, and one boss with a revealing outfit.

short_description: A traditional turn based RPG with a huge focus on story. An endless evil plagues the world but are they truly evil? Watch the world change before your eyes as the universe reaches its end! Save the universe from the secrets of your world in War of Zanzor III: Birth of Unity!
